doc.field: CORRECTION - PHIBRO ENERGY CHAIRMAN In New York story headlined "Phibro Energy chairman said to have resigned," please read in headline "Former Phibro Energy Chariman Starts New company" and first paragraph: Thomas O'Malley, former chairman and chief executive officer of Phibro Energy, a subsidiary of Salomon Bros. Inc., has formed a oil trading company. (clarifies that O'Malley was former chairman)
